segments.text: I see the water overflowing, and it’s making me really happy for some reason.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I don’t know why, but I find it funny that the woman hasn’t noticed yet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her foot is in the puddle, and she’s still drying that plate like nothing’s wrong.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think the kids are going to have a great story to tell later.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is about to fall, but he’s so determined to get those cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if the girl is going to catch him if he tips over.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is so focused on her task, and it’s kind of adorable.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel like this is one of those moments that will be funny in hindsight.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I just hope no one gets hurt in the process.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole scene is like a comedy of errors unfolding before my eyes.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t wait to see how it all plays out.
segments.speaker: PAR
